title: Hello World
content: This is the usual Hello World post.

title: Passing Props
content: Props are key-value pairs passed into a React component. They allow data to flow from one component down to its children components.

title: What is State?
content: State is a data structure containing information describing the application at any given point in time.

title: Learn React Router
content: Routing is the process of keeping the browser URL in sync with what's displayed on the page.
